description: The Mudman of Faron constantly reenact their famous battles in a series of plays called the War of Masks. Such frequent use of weapons greatly enhances their attack speed in battle.
tooltip: The Mudman of Faron constantly reenact their famous battles in a series of plays called the War of Masks. Such frequent use of weapons greatly enhances their attack speed in battle. (+20% Attack Rate - All Mudmen Units and Mudman Tower)
